sentences.en: 50% of men under 35 spend at least 20 minutes preening themselves every morning in the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 50%的35岁以下男性每天早上至少花20分钟在盥洗室精心打扮。

sentences.en: A real man didn't prance around and yap at the mouth and preen for the camera.
sentences.cn: 显然生活中的人不会在摄影机前跃马而起,厉声喝斥,刻意打扮.

sentences.en: Brian: Oh. Well, next time, preen yourself before asking her out.
sentences.cn: 布莱恩: 噢. 那下次你要开口约她出去之前,先好好打扮一下吧.

sentences.en: Do not preen yourself on defeating so weak a person.
sentences.cn: 不要因打败弱者而自傲.

sentences.en: He never cared a preen for her.
Juvenile king penguins preen on the shore.
sentences.cn: 年轻的企鹅首领在岸边用嘴整理羽毛.

sentences.en: Rare birds preen themselves right in front of your camera.
sentences.cn: 很少有鸟类会在镜头面前梳理自己的羽毛。

sentences.en: They sat in Germaine Rocher's salon watching the languid mannequins preen and simper.
sentences.cn: 她们正坐在吉米·罗切的美术展览馆里,看着那些疲乏的服装模特炫耀服装和假笑.

sentences.en: Together , the men preen, strut , shimmy , and shake their feathered costumes, mimicking birds of paradise.
sentences.cn: 人们梳妆打扮, 昂首阔步, 抖动着羽毛装束, 模仿那里的天堂鸟的动作.

sentences.en: Tonight, you can watch the women figure skaters pout and preen their way to the medals.
sentences.cn: 今晚, 你们将看到女子花样滑冰选手把自己打扮得漂漂亮亮的,去争取金牌.

trans.tran_cn: (鸟)用嘴整理, 打扮, 赞扬
trans.tran_en: if a bird preens or preens itself, it cleans itself and makes its feathers smooth using its beak
